@dkhere: MP4 is most widely accepted format, mkv is NOT. Your problem (one of few, I guess) is a wrong player. You must learn to Google.

@strmprpl: Old cartoons cannot be particularly small. Old Disney classics are Full Screen (4:3) and all my encodes of such movies ended badly. Savings are negligent (regarding size are not so big, shrinking 700 MB to 500 MB is a waste of time and quality really suffer if size goes down).

I can send you a .dlc container for jdownloader as e-mail attachment and you can choose the movies and the pace of download.
